<a id="OpenXRBindingModifierEditor"></a>

# OpenXRBindingModifierEditor

**Inherits:** [PanelContainer](PanelContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Binding modifier editor.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This is the default binding modifier editor used in the OpenXR action map.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
